problem_text_cn: 如图,过三角形内一点分别作三边的平行线,如果三角形的周长为6cm,则图中三个阴影三角形的周长和为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, make three parallel lines through a point in the triangle. If the perimeter of the triangle is N_0, then the sum of the perimeters of the three shaded triangles in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵EN∥BC,PM∥AB,DQ∥AC,∴四边形EFBP,FQCN,ADFM是平行四边形,∴DF=AM,FM=AD,EF=BP,PF=BE,FQ=NC,FN=CQ,∴三个阴影三角形的周长和为:DE+EF+FD+FM+FN+MN+FP+PQ+FQ=DE+BP+AM+AD+QC+MN+BE+PQ+NC=(AD+DE+BE)+(BP+PQ+CQ)+(NC+MN+AM)=AB+BC+AC=6(cm)．故选:A．
